definition: surname Li/abbr. for 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Classic of Rites

sentences.english: I will answer for it that we shall find no inconvenience from narrow roads on Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 我敢保險，禮拜三我們不會因爲路窄遇到什麼麻煩。

sentences.english: It's bridge club day. Every fourth Wednesday a the month.
sentences.chinese: 每個月的第四個禮拜三是她們的橋牌聚會日。

sentences.english: It's disappointing but I believe and hope that Wednesday will be important.
sentences.chinese: 這很令人失望，但是我相信禮拜三非常重要。

sentences.english: On Wednesday, Miss Kitty went to Miss Fox's house.
sentences.chinese: 禮拜三，貓蜜斯來到狐狸女士的家。

sentences.english: Today, I got fired from the supermarket I work at because the order was done wrong last Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 今天我被打工的超市炒了，因爲上禮拜三下錯了訂單。

sentences.english: Mr Green is flying to England next Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 格林先生下禮拜三飛往英國。

sentences.english: The findings of the court will be published on Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 法庭的判決將於禮拜三頒佈。

definition: to eat one's fill/to be full
vehicle/(more specifically) mobility vehicle (mobility scooter, electric wheelchair, Segway etc)
to accept delivery of goods/to pick up goods
(Tw) (slang) to pass time idly/to chill/to hang out
